benchmark_details.name: Us vs. Them
benchmark_details.overview: We present the new Us vs. Them dataset, consisting of 6861 Reddit comments annotated for populist attitudes and the first large-scale computational models of this phenomenon.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To investigate the relationship between populist mindsets and social groups, as well as a range of emotions typically associated with these.

data.source: Comments extracted from Reddit that refer to social groups in response to news articles.

methodology.calculation: Mean Squared Error loss for regression task; Cross-Entropy loss for classification.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate a more discriminatory attitude towards the labeled group.
methodology.baseline_results: Pearson R of 0.545 as single-task baseline; MTL with emotions achieved 0.570.
methodology.validation: Statistical tests including ANOVA and Tukey HSD test for significance.
